name: Disturb:Base M
description:
This short game is for my study and I decided to give it freeplay and won't update,its background somehow links to my longer game "Disturb: Conspiracy",which happened in a underground bio factory in Malaysia,and misson done by someone else,before Shawn investigate the other one in Lampkur later.

You were sent here to collect the bio-youngs,and you slowly find how those monsters were made and appear somewhere else,including Lampkur.

Get 30 bio-young samples,unlock all doors and escape.

Not full test yet,please consider before downloading.And the scene is very dark.

 "Disturb:Conspiracy"

https://arealkollen.itch.io/disturbconspiracy

W/A/S/D - Movement

Space - Jump

L Shift - Sprint

E - Interact

A project for study,not full test yet,and the music copyright is not available.It inspired me the later game "Disturb: Conspiracy"

You can help me making more games by donating me if you like: https://paypal.me/arealkollen
